field.description: Changing this option adjusts the system BPF buffer size. Leave blank if you do not know what this does. Default is 1024.

Changing this option adjusts the system maximum BPF buffer size. Leave blank if you do not know what this does. Default is 524288. This value should never be set above hardware cache size. The best (optimal size) is 50% - 80% of the hardware cache size.
Changing this option adjusts the system maximum BPF insert size. Leave blank if you do not know what this does. Default is 512.
Add items to here will be automatically inserted into the running snort configuration
Snort signature info files will be installed during updates. At leats 500 mb of memory is needed.
Please choose the type of Alert logging you will like see in the Alerts Tab. The options are Full descriptions or Fast short descriptions

field.fielddescr: Send alerts to main System logs.
field.description: Snort will send Alerts to the Pfsense system logs.
Snort will log packets to a tcpdump-formatted file. The file then can be analyzed by a wireshark type of application. WARNING: File may become large.
Example: output database: log, mysql, dbname=snort user=snort host=localhost password=xyz

field.fielddescr: Log Alerts to a snort unified file.
field.description: Snort will log Alerts to a file in the UNIFIED format.
